text: Futhi khumbula ngenkathi ethi uJesu indodana kaMariya, “Oh bantwana baka-Israyeli ngempela mina ngiyisithunywa sikaMvelinqangi kunina ngiqinisekisa lokho okwakungaphambilini kwami okuyi-Torah futhi ngingumlethi wezindaba ezinhle ngesithunywa esiza ngemumva kwami igama laso ngu-Ahmad, manjalo kwathi lapho esefika kubona nobufakazi obucacile bathi, “lona ngumlingo ocacile”
